headline: "Oracle of Omaha" Buffett Bets Big on Constellation Brands Stock. Should You Buy It in March 2025?
summary: Recently, his Berkshire Hathaway investment vehicle has much preferred buying U.S. Treasury bills and maintaining a large cash pile to load up on equities when the opportunity presents itself.  As revealed in a recent regulatory filing, toward the end of 2024, its new position in the company comprised a 5.6 million-plus share stake worth over $1.2 billion at that point.  Here's a look at whether I think other investors should follow Buffett's lead and buy Constellation too.
